actions.text: the virtual assistant directs user to the shopping section with a smooth transition.
actions.name: navigate_to_shop

actions.text: the virtual assistant highlights the user's cart, indicating its availability.
actions.name: highlight_cart

actions.text: the virtual assistant gestures towards the shopping section for better engagement.
actions.name: gesture_shopping

actions.text: the virtual assistant presents the item details with a subtle fade effect.
actions.name: show_item_details

actions.text: the virtual assistant indicates adding an item with an upward motion.
actions.name: add_item_animation

actions.text: the virtual assistant displays details about the 'Winter body' item, using a pop-up effect.
actions.name: display_winter_body_details

actions.text: the virtual assistant smoothly transitions to show navigation options.
actions.name: show_navigation_options

actions.text: the virtual assistant presents more options with a gentle slide-in animation.
actions.name: show_more_options

actions.text: the virtual assistant indicates an increment in cart items with a quick bounce.
actions.name: item_added_animation

actions.text: the virtual assistant emphasizes adding a new item with a glowing border effect.
actions.name: add_new_item_highlight

actions.text: the virtual assistant suggests creating an item with a smooth rotation.
actions.name: create_new_item_rotation

description: This is a webpage that features a variety of shoes for sale. It includes sections for shopping, viewing cart items, and exploring products. The page has multiple interactable elements like buttons and item cards that facilitate user interaction and navigation.
